page.title: 14THE LOCAL PAPER OF NANTGLYN.
page.content: The Welsh media of the area are S4C and the local Welsh paper.{Y Gadlas } papur y fro rhwng Conwy a Chlwyd, (the local paper for the communities between the rivers Conwy and Clwyd) is the local monthly paper. The strength of the Welsh language in the area is shown by the circulation of 2500. The paper has existed for 10 years. It ensures that people can read about themselves in their own native tongue. The most popular items are childrens corner, farming news, bardic works, religious column and Welsh learners. The papers most recent fund raising event was an evening of wrestling. The paper sponsors{eisteddfodau}and a drama festival each year which has up to 9 groups competing. Coffee mornings and the annual fair raise money and are an enjoyable part of Welsh social life.
